name: North by Honeywell Electrical Safety Kit
description: Comprehensive PPE kit designed for NFPA 70E and OSHA compliance on electrical jobs.
target_audience_match: Perfect for electrical contractors dealing with arc flash risks who need field-ready protection they can trust.

name: BRADY Electrical Lockout/Tagout Kit
description: Essential LOTO kit to keep electrical jobs safe and OSHA-compliant.
target_audience_match: Great for electricians tired of cobbling together lockout tools and risking avoidable mistakes.

name: Klein Tools Electrician's Jobsite Kit
description: OSHA-aligned safety essentials packed for the everyday electrical pro.
target_audience_match: Ideal for jobsite electricians who want grab-and-go gear that passes any walkthrough.

name: 3M Electrical PPE Compliance Kit
description: Top-tier personal protection gear engineered to exceed OSHA standards.
target_audience_match: For teams near energized gear who want premium coverage without piecing together protection.

name: Saf-T-Gard Electrical Safety Starter Kit
description: Affordable, OSHA-aligned kit for new or small electrical crews.
target_audience_match: A smart entry-level pick for contractors building their first safety kit without blowing the budget.
